SEARCH
Package org.pizzeria.worker

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.pizzeria.worker.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Baker, Courier
public abstract class Worker extends Thread
The Worker class is an abstract class that represents a worker in a pizzeria. Each worker has a working time, a logger, a name, and a flag indicating if they can work. This class extends the Thread class, allowing workers to run as separate threads.

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      Overrides the run() method from the Thread class. This method represents the main logic of the worker, and should be implemented by subclasses.
